name: Purple Mr. Nice
description: Granddaddy Purple crossed with Mr. Nice.  This strain captures the purple color of GDP and the smell and taste of Mr. Nice.  A very powerful indica that has a high probability of fuzzy couch-lock.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Euphoric, Happy, Uplifted, Insomnia, Pain, Depression, Stress, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Headache, Anxious, Dizzy
